txt.en: Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
Hard Tack Event: Special Snack
Deliver the snack to a snack table

'The grand chefs above call for the crafting of hard tack, and I am here to see the workers here thrive in their efforts.

'Prospectors and labourers hauling ever-burning ore need some extra strength while they do the back-breaking work. We will make them a hearty meal to strengthen them and lessen their burden as they do so.

'Collect mushrooms, fish, and spice to make the hearty meal and deliver it to the tables.'
A sneaky hobbit stole the snack
<rgb=#ff0000>Avoid sneaky hobbits</rgb>
Place the Thorin's Hall Snack onto a snack table
Collected spice ingredient
Complete the snack in the oven and deliver it to the table
Collect craft ingredients from the spice rack
Collected mushroom ingredient
Collect mushroom ingredients from the mushroom crate
A snack providing a boost to speed is a necessity in times like these. Try your hand at delivering this snack.
Collect the ingredients needed to craft the Thorin's Hall Brew from the nearby mushroom crate and spice rack.
You lost the snack
Craft a Thorin's Hall Mushroom Snack then deliver it to a snack table to help all the workers perform at their peak.
Place the snack onto a snack table
You made a Thorin's Hall Mushroom Snack. Complete the snack in an oven and deliver it to a snack table. Avoid sneaky hobbits.
